archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Specify Party Demographic Definition Group
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Group party demographic definitions or define a group of groups.

properties.value: Specify Party Demographic Definition Group defines a group party demographic definitions or defines a group of groups. For example for an organization a group may represent a collection of demographics about the organization itself, such as headquarters location, number and location of offices (domestic vs. international, regions/triads); each have different access requirements. This process also enables changes and deletions to be made to any grouping.
